oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Uncle Fud DJ audition for WAPO
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Audition recording for a DJ program presented by Uncle Fud (Red Brown) for WAPO, Chattanooga, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bob Atcher; Dinning Sisters; Martha Carson; Webb Pierce
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Galloping On The Guitar) -- Opening statement (Uncle Fud) -- Blue Christmas (Bob Atcher, Dinning Sisters) (recording) -- Bruton Scotch Snuff commercial (Uncle Fud) -- Weather report (Uncle Fud) -- Cryin' Holy Unto The Lord (Martha Carson) -- Model Tobacco commercial (Uncle Fud) -- I'll Always Take Care Of You (Webb Pierce) -- Red Seal Sweet Snuff commercial (Uncle Fud) -- Closing statement (Uncle Fud) -- Theme (Galloping On The Guitar) -- Station ID
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WAPO (Radio station : Chattanooga, Tenn.); Brown, Red (Disc jockey); Atcher, Bob; Dinning Sisters; Carson, Martha; Pierce, Webb, 1921-1991
